thread.title: BRIEF-Trivago NV Q4 Total Revenue €181.5 Million

title: BRIEF-Trivago NV Q4 Total Revenue €181.5 Million
text:
February 7, 2018 / 12:15 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Trivago NV Q4 Total Revenue €181.5 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Trivago NV: 
* TRIVAGO NV QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE INCREASED TO €181.5 MILLION, COMPARED TO €169.2 MILLION IN Q4 2016‍​ 
* TRIVAGO NV - THE NUMBER OF QUALIFIED REFERRALS INCREASED TO 139.3 MILLION IN THE FOURTH QUARTER OF 2017, OR 14% YEAR-OVER-YEAR 
* TRIVAGO NV QTRLY NET LOSS WAS €9.6 MILLION COMPARED TO NET INCOME OF €0.1 MILLION IN THE FOURTH QUARTER OF 2016 Source text for Eikon: ( bit.ly/2EOKEbu ) Further company coverage:
